name: Neon union
description:
Neon union 2

I want to dedicate this series of works to gossip and its redisseminators. It is so common for women to be the main messengers of gossip. I don’t want to hide, I like to gossip and I do it tastefully. For example, with a delicious cocktail, in a pleasant atmosphere and with people close to me. But there’s never anything wrong with this conversation. I just blow off steam with my girlfriends and share news. But gossipers aren’t always as harmless as they seem. And in my series «Neon Union» I want to tell you about types of gossip , and you decide for yourself, maybe you are one of them?


The first type is gossip fleeting. 
He may not be the true gossip. It’s just that in cold times, he mimics to protect himself, to have a conversation, or to increase his value. This harmless dude shares news and sometimes doesn’t even notice he’s started gossiping, because this conversation has no subtext or anger.
Such a friend surely met you in your life and  often you are the first  type
